CustomField.description: Short - We expect to realize the Partnership Construct’s Objective in under 6 months. Medium - We expect to realize the Partnership Construct’s Objective in 6 to 24 months. Long - We expect to fully realize the Partnership Construct’s Objective in over 24 months.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Short - We expect to realize the Partnership Construct’s Objective in under 6 months. Medium - We expect to realize the Partnership Construct’s Objective in 6 to 24 months. Long - We expect to fully realize the Partnership Construct’s Objective in over 24 months.
CustomField.label: Time Horizon
